member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthCheckPublisherOptions
member.summary: Options for the default service that executes instances.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthCheckPublisherOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthCheckPublisherOptions.Delay
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial delay applied after the application starts before executing instances. The delay is applied once at startup, and does not apply to subsequent iterations. The default value is 5 seconds.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthCheckPublisherOptions.Period
member.summary: Gets or sets the period of execution. The default value is 30 seconds.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthCheckPublisherOptions.Predicate
member.summary: Gets or sets a predicate that is used to filter the set of health checks executed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthCheckPublisherOptions.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for executing the health checks an all instances. Use to execute with no timeout. The default value is 30 seconds.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthCheckService
member.summary: A service which can be used to check the status of instances registered in the application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthCheckService.CheckHealthAsync(System.Func{Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthCheckRegistration,System.Boolean},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs the provided health checks and returns the aggregated status
member.param: A predicate that can be used to include health checks based on user-defined criteria.
A which can be used to cancel the health checks.
member.exception: The cancellation token was canceled. This exception is stored into the returned task.
member.returns: A which will complete when all the health checks have been run, yielding a containing the results.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthCheckService.CheckHealthAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs all the health checks in the application and returns the aggregated status.
member.param: A which can be used to cancel the health checks.
member.exception: The cancellation token was canceled. This exception is stored into the returned task.
member.returns: A which will complete when all the health checks have been run, yielding a containing the results.
